positions.title: IT-Systemadministrator

technologies.name: Implementing user stories with clean code

summary.headline: Fullstack developer experienced in:
experience: Agile project teams and software projects (e.g. Lidl DE)
bring: 4+ years of software development in corporate environments
Understanding of clean code, architecture and user focus
Team player, clear communication, reliable way of working
focus: Deepening the modern web stack & fullstack engineering
Building and hosting own projects for hands-on practice
summary.open: Open to new opportunities in web development / application engineering.

sport.title: Sports
sport.content: I regularly engage in strength and endurance training and enjoy long walks.
sport.target: Goals: To document my progress and improve wherever I can.
sport.functionalities: Why: I value my mental and physical health.
sport.stack: My favorites: Vineyard runs, high-volume strength workouts, small-field football, etc.

woods.title: Woodwork
woods.content: Growing up with weekends spent preparing wood together in the city forest for winter heating fills me with pride.
woods.target: Goal: Working together was always faster and made the work more enjoyable.
woods.functionalities: Useful: I learned a lot about work and compensation. Woodwork warms you at least twice: while working and while heating.
woods.stack: Tools: Own chainsaw with necessary equipment, chainsaw certification, etc.

diy.title: DIY
diy.content: I like repairing things around the house and love being hands-on.
diy.target: Goal: Things break, it happens. Moving away from a throwaway society toward recycling and upcycling.
diy.functionalities: Useful: Sustainability and technical understanding have interested me since childhood.
diy.stack: I use AI, written guides and YouTube tutorials to fix things. If it’s too tricky, I consult professionals.

adventure.title: Action & Adventure
adventure.content: I love adventures like skydiving or cliff jumping – adrenaline is my friend!
adventure.target: Goals: Getting out of my comfort zone.
adventure.functionalities: I get to know my limits again and again. This drives me to reflect on my abilities and to keep setting new goals.
adventure.stack: A base level of athleticism and curiosity for the unknown drive me to try new things.

monteur.title: Monteur Rooms Nedic
monteur.description: A project for providing worker accommodations with modern equipment and simple booking options.
monteur.target: Target group: Construction companies & workers, students
monteur.functionalities: Features: Booking form, media library, easy contact options

dgv.title: Digital Business Card
dgv.description: The digital business card for modern networking – fast, stylish and smart.
dgv.target: Target group: People interested in digitalization
dgv.functionalities: Features: Contact entry, company selection, browser visualization, scan to phone

portal.title:

App Manager
portal.description: An application portal that centrally manages an app pool where values can be added, read, updated, and deleted.

chogan.title:
Planned: 
PWA, native, AI...
chogan.description: My goal is to work intensively with future-oriented technologies to develop innovative digital solutions.
chogan.target: Target group: Future clients and interested users
chogan.functionalities: Features: Offline capabilities, GPT integrations, system component integration, data analysis, etc.
chogan.stack: Interesting technologies include: Service Worker & Web App Manifest, OpenAI & Anthropic, .js distributions & Python, etc.
